content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-85--87)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (41.0,-86.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), and (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining and Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0,-61.0)
- Stone furnace at position (-27.0,-58.0)
- 2 Wooden chests at positions (-27.5,-59.5) and (-24.5,-58.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5)
- Additional furnaces at positions (-23.0,-58.0) and (-21.0,-58.0)

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10--6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and transport belts connecting the system

### Smelting Line at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), and (6.0,0.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters forming input/output lines
- Transport belt system for material movement

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5-4.5, y=20-27)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at position (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting these components
- Electricity distribution network with poles at (7.5,20.5), (7.5,13.5), (10.5,12.5), (11.5,20.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with pipe connections
- Ensure proper alignment when connecting pipes between entities
- Check that pipe endpoints match the connection points of machines
- Verify fluid flow direction matches machine input/output points

### Errors with fuel management
- Keep track of fuel inventory before attempting to insert fuel
- Ensure coal supply is available before attempting to fuel machines
- Set up automated fuel delivery systems for critical machines

### Errors with entity placement and connections
- Verify space is available before placing new entities
- Ensure proper alignment between connected entities
- Check that transport belts and inserters have valid pickup and drop positions

### Errors with chest management
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent overflow
- Set up proper item extraction when chests are full
- Ensure proper item flow through connected chest systems
